answers.answer: youll get your next ultrasound at 20 weeks for your gender scan. you can get a early gender scan at 16 weeks but it wont be with your dr. we are going to a place called angle prints its a little expensive but i rather know sooner than 20 weeks so we can start getting stuff a little sooner

question: How often can you get ultra sounds?? Im so anxious!! I am 3 months and had my first at 7 weeks I'm ready to see my baby again!! I go today to get tested for gestational diabetes but I want a ultra sound!! Had a miscarriage in 09 and I'm so excited but also nervous. So when should I expect another ultrasound??
title: New to this
